m_szDocSumamry: Insurers Attempt to Reduce Risks of Carbon Capture & Storage July 13th, 2009 by Susan Kraemer   [social_buttons] In January the Swiss insurer Zurich Financial Services AG launched two insurance products to cover liabilities for Carbon Capture & Storage. It is now processing four submissions from some of the 10 to 15 European companies planning to have plants running by 2015.
